sourcesContent:
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Iframe from 'react-iframe' const SchoolOfficer = () => { return (

School Officer

Make tuition fee payment, then go to the bursary to clear payment, move to your department by going to your School Officer's office, he/she will guide you through and hand over several forms to be signed accordingly by the, Head of Department, BU teaching Hospital, Student Support services, Data and Archive officer, Admission officer Then lastly, School Officer again.

Both the Bursary and School Officer location is in the map below each department and make sure your Location is turned on for directions from your where you are.

Click View larger map in the map below then it will redirect you to either Google maps application or website and click on directions to direct you from where you are.

Note that the signing process is to be done accordingly.

Make sure your Location is turned on.


School of Computing and Engineering Sciences

Veronica Adeleke School of Social Sciences


Mass Communication

); } export default SchoolOfficer;
